name: Groppi - Hardest Game
description:
The hardest game in the world, CAN YOU PASS THROUGH 15 LEVELS?

Groppi - is a complex game with a simple design, go through the levels one by one, but know if you hit the enemy, you are ready to go through the game first,dodge enemies using acceleration, to accelerate you just need to tap the screen.

Key features of Groppi:

• Each next level is more difficult than the previous one.

• Ability to unlock new characters for passing every fifth level.

• The presence of 40 super difficult levels in the game.

• Compete against yourself and other people in the global leaderboard. Show others who the biofeedback is!

Groppi - THE NEW MOST CORRECT GAME.

Groppi - is a super challenging game with simple graphics that deserves your attention, the game has 40 different levels of difficulty, the next level is more difficult than the previous one, and the cherry on the cake is the fact that if you die the game will start from the very beginning.
